room.name: Game Room
room.description: You suddenly sit up on the couch in your game room. Was I sleeping? Must have been, quite a long nap at that. You look over to your puzzle on the table, "*sigh* If only I could have a REAL adventure"... You notice a stray chess piece on the ground.

room.name: Hallway
room.description: The hallway is dark and cold.

npc.name: Teacher
npc.description: Teacher: Oh my, oh dear, oh my, oh my. I've been wounded in the war. Please help revive me!

room.name: Statue
room.description: The Statue comes to life all of a sudden! It's a real Knight!

response.say: Oh, you're a Page, aren't you? One of my very own kind. It's an honor to know you. I've been frozen in this statue for quite some time, I need a wizard to help me become human again. I suppose you can't help me...
Oh goodness, why... are you a wizard? Could you help me become human again, a terrible witch forced me into this form.
Oh goodness, why... are you a wizard? Could you help me become human again, a terrible witch forced me into this form. But.. you're so young, I guess you don't know magic yet...

room.description: There's an atlas on the bookshelf there
